title: Create Knowledge IQ competitive exam prep website (dark navy + saffron)

requirements.text: Create a responsive, modern landing page for an educational website named "Knowledge IQ" focused on competitive exams (UPSC, SSC, RRB, WBCS, PSC) using a dark navy blue and saffron theme with a clean, trustworthy, exam-oriented look and consistent typography/spacing across all sections.

quotes: Create a professional educational website named "Knowledge IQ" focused on competitive exams like UPSC, SSC, RRB, WBCS and PSC. Use a dark navy blue and saffron color theme. ... The website should look modern, clean, exam-oriented and trustworthy.

acceptanceCriteria: The homepage prominently displays the site name "Knowledge IQ" and references the target exams (UPSC, SSC, RRB, WBCS, PSC).
Primary colors are dark navy blue and saffron and are applied consistently to backgrounds, accents, buttons, and highlights.
Layout is responsive and usable on mobile, tablet, and desktop without horizontal scrolling.

requirements.text: Implement a hero section that includes: (1) a visual featuring an India map outline and exam-prep icons (book, target, globe, chart), (2) a clear headline/subheadline in English describing exam preparation, and (3) call-to-action buttons labeled exactly "Start Practice" and "Download Free PDFs".

quotes: Add a hero section with India map outline and exam icons like book, target, globe and chart.
Include call-to-action buttons like "Start Practice" and "Download Free PDFs".

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section renders an India map outline plus the four specified icons as part of the hero visual (not only as text).
Two CTA buttons are visible in the hero with labels exactly: "Start Practice" and "Download Free PDFs".
CTAs are keyboard focusable and have visible hover/focus styles.

requirements.text: Add distinct, clearly labeled homepage sections for: Daily GK, Mock Tests, Current Affairs, Previous Year Questions, and Free PDFs. Each section should include a short description and an obvious action (button/link) to explore that section.

quotes: Include sections for Daily GK, Mock Tests, Current Affairs, Previous Year Questions and Free PDFs.

acceptanceCriteria: All five sections appear on the homepage with headings exactly matching the requested labels.
Each section includes at least one short English description line and a clickable action element (button or link).
Sections are visually separated with consistent spacing and follow the site theme.

requirements.text: Implement basic on-page SEO for the website: set an appropriate HTML title and meta description for "Knowledge IQ"; ensure there is a single H1 on the homepage; use semantic landmarks/structure (header, main, section, footer) and accessible alt text for meaningful images.

quotes: Make it mobile friendly and SEO optimized.

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage has a single H1 and uses semantic sections (header/main/section/footer).
Document title includes "Knowledge IQ" and references competitive exam preparation.
A meta description is present and written in English.
All meaningful images used in content/hero have non-empty alt text; decorative images/icons are marked appropriately (e.g., empty alt or aria-hidden).

requirements.text: Ensure the generated hero artwork is included as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and is used in the hero section without fetching images from the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
No backend calls are required to render the hero artwork.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only Shadcn components); compose them instead.
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: User accounts/authentication flows (Internet Identity) are out of scope unless explicitly requested.
Implementing real practice engines, question banks, mock test scoring, or content management is out of scope for this request.
Server-side rendering and Next.js-style SEO features are out of scope (React SPA only).

required: Hero illustration with India map outline and four exam icons (book, target, globe, chart) in a modern flat style, dark navy + saffron accents (knowledge-iq-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
Set of four standalone flat icons: book, target, globe, chart matching the hero style and palette (knowledge-iq-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)
